description.value:
Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 8, Pirates of the Inner Sea pg. 19, Skull and Shackles Player's Guide pg. 6

Statistics

Cost 1 gp Weight 1 lb.

Damage 1d3 (small), 1d4 (medium); Critical x2; Range -; Type S; Special disarm, nonlethal

Category Light; Proficiency Martial

Weapon Groups Flails

Description

This short whip is made of nine knotted thongs about 3 feet in length. A cat-o'-nine-tails deals no damage to any creature with an armor bonus of +1 or higher or a natural armor bonus of +3 or higher.
